story.kicker_image_caption: HPPSC HPAS Exam 2015: Download admit cards now
story.storykicker: The Himachal Pradesh Administrative Services has released the admit card for the Himachal Pradesh Administrative Services (HPAS) (Preliminary) Examination 2015.
story.storybody:
The Himachal Pradesh Administrative Services has released the admit card for the Himachal Pradesh Administrative Services (HPAS) (Preliminary) Examination 2015.

All the students appearing for the examination can download the admit card for the same, from the official website, the link for which is www.hp.gov.in

The examination will be conducted by the commission on June 5 at various test centres.

The examination is held to fill up 25 vacancies in services like:

  • HP Administrative Services
  • Police Services
  • Tehsildar Class I
  • Block Development Officer
  • Excise and Textile Officer

Paper pattern:

The written examination will be conducted in two sessions of 2 hours each and both the examination will consist of 100 objective type questions of 200 marks each.

Paper II:  The paper will be conducted from 10 am to 12 noon. All the candidates will be tested on General Studies and will get question based on the following topics:

  • History, geography, political, art & culture, and socio economic development of Himachal Pradesh
  • Current events of national and International importance
  • History of India and Indian National Movement
  • Indian and world geography
  • Economic and social development
  • General issues on environmental ecology

Paper II: The paper will be conducted from 2 pm to 4 pm. All the candidates will be tested on their Aptitude and will get question based on the following topics:

  • Comprehension
  • Interpersonal skills including communication skills
  • Logical reasoning and analytical ability
  • Decision making and problem solving
  • General mental ability
  • Basic numeracy
  • English language and comprehension skills.


Steps to download the admit cards:

  • All the candidates need to log on to the official website, www.hp.gov.in
  • Click on relevant link
  • Enter the user name and password
  • Click to log in
  • The admit card will be displayed
  • All the candidates need to take print out of the same for future reference

For any other query, all the candidates need to visit the official website.
